content: This contains a newline tag.<n>This is a new line.

This is an HTML tag test.

I've created a new paragraph.

The last paragraph didn't have a "closing tag."

It's crazy to think how well you can customize your text with HTML.
Click this link to find out which HTML tags are supported by the Qt web engine.

This is normal text and my pose at idx 1.This is bold text. This is a pose with an alias.This is a surface tag with multiple parameters. I am going to hide until this text is finished printing. I've returned. I'm now going to waste space in this balloon.I've cleared the balloon so there's some more space to write. I will now wait for 5 seconds. The wait is over. I will give you an undefined tag. Done.

Hello! I'm a lion.This is my big balloon.

Pretty cool huh?

You can fit a lot of text in here.
<!speed[10]>This text print very very quickly. <!speed[100]>But this is very slow.

Hello! I am a big lion.I am a smol lion :3

We are two lions on your screen.
<!i[1]>Hello! My name is <!get[char1name]> and my little brother is called <!get[char2name]>. <!wait[1000]>Your name is <!get[username]>, right?
